item.title: HERE COMES THE CLIMATE CULT!: We Are Living in a Woke, Neo-Marxist, Soft-Totalitarian State [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ July 27, 2023
On this episode of the Dispatch, Andrew is flying solo, and he is taking a look at the woke, neo-Marxist, soft-totalitarian state that is Canada. As always, he brings receipts to show how this regime continues to move forward full-steam with continued covid madness, climate hysteria, and rainbow indoctrination. Buckle up!

[Segment 1] -  The State and its fiscal insanity:
"Alberta Taxpayers Paid Millions in Severance to AHS Advisors Last Year: Sunshine List" | Rebel News: https://www.rebelnews.com/alberta_taxpayers_paid_millions_severance_ahs_advisors_last_year_sunshine_list;
"RCMP Systemically Racist" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2023/07/26/rcmp-systemically-racist;

[Segment 2] -  COVID collateral damage continues:
"Serious Doubt Raised About COVID-19 Vaccine Safety After Forced Release of 15,000 Pages of Clinical Trial Data" | The Epoch Times: https://www.theepochtimes.com/article/serious-doubt-raised-about-covid-19-vaccine-safety-after-forced-release-of-15000-pages-of-clinical-trial-data-5414614?src_src=partner&src_cmp=whatfinger;
"New COVID Vaccine Bombshell Emerges | Facts Matter" | The Epoch Times: https://www.theepochtimes.com/epochtv/new-covid-vaccine-bombshell-emerges-facts-matter-5422680?est=p2lMm60AxUk4KhT8Tdg435i1Z5If8F9MGXFPu83cvxgWW2F97OB20TlVkrGxtGEV0H8dPjIWTE7DUg%3D%3D;
"Risk of Clotting and Bleeding Events Associated With the Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine: A Disproportionality Analysis" | Zenodo: https://zenodo.org/record/8120771;
"Despite Minimal COVID Deaths, All-Cause Mortality Spiked in Netherlands: Prof. Theo Schetters" | Bright Light News: https://brightlightnews.com/despite-minimal-covid-deaths-all-cause-mortality-spiked-in-netherlands-prof-theo-schetters;
"Funding Vax Passport to 2026" | Blacklock's Reporter: https://www.blacklocks.ca/funding-vax-passport-to-2026;

[Segment 3] -  Here comes the Climate cult:
"Deadly Heat Wave Kills Dozens in Europe as Continent Braces for More" | The New York Times: https://www.nytimes.com/2023/07/20/world/europe/heat-elderly.html;
"Globalists Suggest Finance Shock and Climate Controls to Launch Their Great Reset" | ZeroHedge: https://www.zerohedge.com/geopolitical/globalists-suggest-finance-shock-and-climate-controls-launch-their-great-reset.

item.title: In the World, Not of the World: Christians Working Worshipfully in the Public Square [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ July 25, 2023
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, host Andrew DeBartolo is joined by faithful Christian men working worshipfully in the public square. First, Andrew talks to Owner & Creative Director at Kurios Creative Media, Thaddeus Maharaj, about creating great art for the glory of God. Next, pastor and bitcoiner Alin Armstrong joins him to speak about fiat money, Bitcoin, his newest projects, his new book and his new initiative. Finally, Ontario President of the Christian Heritage Party, Jim Enos, joins him to talk about glorifying God in the political arena. 

[Interview 1] ft. Thaddeus Maharaj (08:54-31:44):
Kurios Creative Media: https://kuriosmedia.com/ 
Theotivity Podcast: https://www.theotivity.com/;

[Interview 2] ft. Alan Armstrong (33:04-53:11):
Bitcoin for Babies: https://www.lifegiverchurch.net/bitcoin-for-babies/;
"The Bible and Bitcoin" by Alin Armstrong: https://thebibleandbitcoin.lifegiverchurch.net/;

[Interview 3] ft. Jim Enos (5405-01:18:08):
Jim's CHP Profile: https://www.chp.ca/candidates/jim-enos;
ARPA v. Hamilton: https://arpacanada.ca/publication/arpa-v-hamilton/; 
ARPA v. Hamilton Reply: https://arpacanada.ca/publication/arpa-v-hamilton-reply/;

item.title: WE ARE NOT OUT OF THE WOODS YET Pt. 2: Weaving Our Way Through the Woke Woods [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ July 20, 2023
WE'RE NOT OUT OF THE WOODS YET! Turns out that Transmania continues to infect every single Canadian institution, and it will leave no one and nothing unaffected. If we remain quiescent, we will be overcome. Let us, therefore, speak up and speak out against this insane, evil, Neo-Marxist ideology.

[Segment 1] -  The horrific consequences of trans ideology:
"Transgender Youth Data: Neglect and Confusion in the USA" | Reuters: https://www.reuters.com/investigates/special-report/usa-transyouth-data;
"Lawmakers Demand Answers from NIH Over Transgender Youth Suicides" | The Epoch Times: https://www.theepochtimes.com/lawmakers-demand-answers-from-nih-over-transgender-youth-suicides_5390307.html;
"Cardiac Adverse Events Following COVID-19 Vaccination: A Case Series" | PubMed: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/36652355;
"Miss Netherlands Won for First Time by a Transgender Woman" | New York Post: https://nypost.com/2023/07/10/miss-netherlands-won-for-first-time-by-a-transgender-woman;
"Parents, Staff Demand TDSB Drop Drag Queen Storytime, Opt-Out; the Board Is Standing Firm" | The Star: https://www.thestar.com/news/gta/2023/07/12/parents-staff-demand-tdsb-drop-drag-queen-storytime-opt-out-the-board-is-standing-firm.html;

[Segment 2] -  Trans madness is Queering the norm:
"Pierre Poilievre Does Not Agree with 'Straight Pride' Message in Photo at Stampede" | CTV News: https://www.ctvnews.ca/politics/pierre-poilievre-does-not-agree-with-straight-pride-message-in-photo-at-stampede-1.6474170;
"Poilievre's Office, Calgary MP Silent Over Latest Photo with Controversial Message" | Toronto Sun: https://torontosun.com/news/national/poilievres-office-calgary-mp-silent-over-latest-photo-with-controversial-message;

[Segment 3] -  We can and must stand firm against LGBTQ lies:
"Trudeau Lectures Muslims on Gender Ideology" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2023/07/13/trudeau-lectures-muslims-gender-ideology;
"Hundreds of Muslim Parents March Against Justin Trudeau's Radical LGBTQ Indoctrination of Canadian Children, Leave Our Kids Alone" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/breaking-hundreds-of-muslim-parents-march-against-justin-trudeaus-radical-lgbtq-indoctrination-of-canadian-children-leave-our-kids-alone?utm_content=;

MUST LISTEN: "Open Letter to Woke Youth" by James Lindsay | New Discourses: https://newdiscourses.com/2023/07/an-open-letter-to-woke-youth/;

item.title: WE ARE NOT OUT OF THE WOODS YET Pt. 1: COVID Insanity & Its DEADLY Impact [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ July 18, 2023
WE'RE NOT OUT OF THE WOODS YET! Turns out that COVID insanity continues apace, claiming lives and livelihoods in its wake. Far from pandemic amnesty, we need to be reminded of how we got to where we are and hold those who have acted unjustly to account. NEVER FORGET!

[Segment 1] -  COVID Injustice Abounds:
"8-Months Pregnant Ontario Nurse Faces Dismissal for Refusing Mandatory COVID Shot" | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/8-months-pregnant-ontario-nurse-faces-dismissal-for-refusing-mandatory-covid-shot;
"Canadian Denied Life-Saving Organ Transplant Over COVID Vaccine Status, Rejected as Candidate by US Hospital" | Rebel News: https://www.rebelnews.com/canadian_denied_life_saving_organ_transplant_over_covid_vaccine_status_rejected_as_candidate_by_us_hospital;
"Ontario Man Dies After Being Denied Kidney Transplant for Being Unvaccinated" | Western Standard: https://www.westernstandard.news/news/ontario-man-dies-after-being-denied-kidney-transplant-for-being-unvaccinated/article_b8b70740-24b6-11ee-aa1f-938d3baccbe3.html;


MUST WATCH: "Deanna McLeod Pt. 3: Big Pharma and Vaccine Conflict of Interest" | OPEN MIKE: https://rumble.com/v246yo4-deanna-mcleod-pt.-3-vaccine-conflicts-of-interest.html; 

[Segment 2] -  COVID Jab Tyranny and its Deadly Consequences:
"Birth Rates Are Dropping Worldwide Post-COVID-19 Vaccination: Here's What Women Can Do" | The Epoch Times: https://www.theepochtimes.com/birth-rates-are-dropping-worldwide-post-covid-19-vaccination-heres-what-women-can-do_5318271.html;
"COVID Vaccine Booster Shots Expected in Fall 2023" | The Globe and Mail: https://www.theglobeandmail.com/canada/article-covid-vaccine-booster-fall-2023;
"New Children's Book: I'm Unvaccinated and That's OK" | Bright Light News: https://brightlightnews.com/new-childrens-book-im-unvaccinated-and-thats-ok;

[Segment 3] -  The COVID COver-up Continues to Unravel:
"Cardiac adverse events following COVID-19 vaccination: a case series" | PubMed Central (PMC): https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9613797;
"Fauci, Harvard, and the CCP: A Look at the Background of COVID's Top Doc" | The Spectator: https://thespectator.com/topic/fauci-harvard-and-the-ccp;
